name: AVCaption.Ruby
desc: An object that presents ruby characters.

items.name: init(text: String, position: AVCaptionRubyPosition, alignment: AVCaptionRubyAlignment)
items.desc: Creates ruby text with position and alignment.

items.name: enum AVCaptionRubyPosition
items.desc: Constants that indicate ruby text positions.

items.name: enum AVCaptionRubyAlignment
items.desc: Constants that indicate ruby text alignments.
